Responsive product card

List of products

When you wrap the cards in .list--products, they will be displayed in a row regardless of the screen size.

List of products - responsive

However, you can also wrap the cards in .list--products--responsive to make them responsive - see the example below (resize the window to notice the difference on moible)

The cards will be displayed in a column on desktop and in a row on mobile. Notice the card layout is the same as in the previous example, but the cards are displayed differently on different devices thanks to the list class.
